text: Got to give it a try.  The trick is having puzzles that feel like a well curated possibility space museum rather than a haphazard archeological dig.  The Witness is perfect in this respect — by embracing constraints and by actively avoiding edge cases and especially hard puzzles.  Stephen's Sausage Roll starts strong (and at a significantly higher difficulty level) but gets a bit random by the end.  Baba is You has even more potential for weirdness.
